name: Mobile PaaS by CloudBees
tagline: Mobile Platform As A Service - build apps, not infrastructure
body: ### CloudBees mobile services This project showcases CloudBees mobile services. We have assembled a showcase of several template projects that you can refer to, build on that show the full range of CloudBees mobile services, from building mobile apps, deploying server apps, integrating data, push messages - all hosted, by us. ## The demo app This app is made up of iOS and Android apps, as well as integration, databases, server apps, and more - all to build a "restaurant review" service - called "gasp" - A pun on "yelp" - get it? Nevermind, it is just a sample. Restaurants are reviewed and geotagged, updates to restaurant views are pushed out to phones once a change in the data is detected. The best way to explore and see the code, docs, is to click around the map, that shows the moving parts: ### Support or Contact More questions? Checkout our Mobile doc page here https://developer.cloudbees.com/bin/view/Mobile read more about CloudBees http://www.cloudbees.com - and drop us a line on info@cloudbees.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
